name: Heart Girl:Starlight
description:
（1） Introduction to the game
Heart girl: starlight is an interesting leisure puzzle game. In the game, you need to find the hidden items in the screen and solve the puzzle, and finally complete the game! All kinds of wonderful operation, and lovely girls together to solve the puzzle!
（2） How to play games
The game operation uses drag and drop and click on items to find items and solve problems. If there is no progress for a long time, it doesn't matter. The automatic prompt function is preset in the game.

（3） Game features
1. Challenge different puzzle games!
2. Each level has different exquisite pictures!
3. Fun to play!
4. Exercise your eyesight!

Free game patches can be found in comments or community discussions.
